name: Country
description: Set the country where the search should be carried out, e.g., 'United States'. Currently, the scraper doesn't work well for full-country searching of sparsely populated countries like USA or Russia. For these, prefer searching city by city or focus on populated states.

name: City
description: Set the city where the search should be carried out, e.g., 'New York'.

name: Limit the number of places
description: This is the maximum number of results you will obtain. A higher number will take longer to scrape. If you want to scrape all places available, set this value to '9999999'.
